name: Vikash Kumar
about: I regard myself as a driven guy that strives to learn new things on a regular basis in order to surpass predetermined goals. Data Science, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning are some of my main interests. Actively exploring ways to utilize my skills and get more experience in using a data-driven approach to solve real-world challenges. I am skilled in Python, Machine Learning, C++ programming, and Data Analytics.  I am also expertise in Badminton and weightlifting.
